subject: Re: Flushed pending centeris patch queue

Jeremy Allison wrote:
> On Sun, May 06, 2007 at 05:37:18PM -0500, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
>> There's other minor fixes.  I tried to break the commits
>> up into manage chunks (about 30 I think).
> 
> Thanks for all the work. I'm intending to review
> them all but this may take some time :-)

Thanks.  I've still got ti finish unit testing the merged
code but the original is in pretty good shape.  It will
take me about another 24 - 48 hours to finish up weeding out
back merges.




cheers, jerry
